scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:data-access-api" "npm run dev:data-analysis"
scripts.build: npm run clean:types && npm run generate-types && npm run build:config && concurrently "npm run build:web" "npm run build:data-access-api" "npm run build:data-analysis"
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test:web" "npm run test:data-access-api" "npm run test:data-analysis"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:once --workspace=@ffxiv-tools/web && cd packages/data-access-api && cargo test && cd ../storage && cargo test
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint:web" "npm run lint:data-access-api" "npm run lint:data-analysis"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:web" "npm run start:data-access-api" "npm run start:data-analysis"
